meanings.definition: Investigated and solved problems or difficulties.
meanings.sent1: She troubleshot the computer issue quickly.
meanings.sent2: He always troubleshot the network errors efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The detective troubleshot the mystery of the missing keys.
meanings.sent4: She troubleshot her way through the maze of technical glitches.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic troubleshot the engine problem with precision.
